long_description: The sneaker-inspired Ahnu Parkside Shoes can be dressed up or down with their canvas-embossed suede uppers and soft nubuck overlays, while the low-profile Vibram(R) outsoles provide good traction. Soft nubuck and canvas-embossed suede upper; moisture-wicking mesh lining. Numentum(TM) internal polyurethane midsole with U-shaped heel stabilizer for neutral positioning and long-lasting comfort. Dual-density comfort polyurethane footbed with memory foam in the forefoot. Internal nylon shank for arch- and mid-foot support. Ahnu Parkside Shoes have Vibram(R) Morflex nonmarking rubber outsoles for dependable traction.
short_description: The sneaker-inspired Ahnu Parkside Shoes can be dressed up or down with their canvas-embossed suede uppers and soft nubuck overlays, while the low-profile Vibram(R) outsoles provide good traction.
